article.title: Analysis of the Microstructure of Titles in the INSPEC Data-Base
article.author: Lynch, Michael F.Petrie, J. HowardSnell, Michael J.
article.text: A high degree of constancy has been found to exist in the microstructure of titles of samples of the INSPEC data-base taken over 3-year period.. Character and diagram frequencies are shown to be relatively stable, while variable-length character-string characterizing samples separated by 3 years in time show close similarities..
